column1: Smoque BBQ////After leaving from Lincoln Park Zoo I took a trip over to get a bite for me and the family. I loved how the business took covid precautions the way they did. Proper PPE required and they even took customer's temperatures for those dining outside. Food was great
column2: 50 dollars worth filled 4 individuals which included a St. Louis rib dinner with Mac and cheese
column4: and cornbread. Next meal was chopped brisket with another Mac and cheese and cornbread with coleslaw. For dessert tried the peach cobbler.
